import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector,useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { getQuizzD } from '../../actions/userActions' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Instructions= () =>{ return ( <> ) } const PlayQuizz = () => { const {id}=useParams() const dispatch=useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getQuizzD(id)) }, [id]) const [difficultyLevel,setDifficultyLevel] = useState(5) const { quizzDetails } = useSelector( (state) => state.appInfo ); console.log(quizzDetails.quizz.questions[0].difficulty,"a") const q=quizzDetails.quizz.questions.filter(quizzDetails.quizz.questions[0].difficulty=5) return ( <> {/* {true?:fd} */}

Q. What is my name ?

Difficulty level : 5
) } export default PlayQuizz
